title: Text Summarization Using SpaCy and BART
description: This script provides both extractive and abstractive text summarization methods. Extractive summarization is implemented using SpaCy, while abstractive summarization leverages the BART transformer model.

summ1.methodology: Identifies keywords based on part-of-speech tags and calculates sentence weights to extract the top 3 most significant sentences.

summ2.methodology: Uses the BART transformer model to generate an abstractive summary of the input text.

notes: Ensure that the 'facebook/bart-large-cnn' model is downloaded when using the BART summarization.
The SpaCy model 'en_core_web_lg' should be installed and loaded.
